content: whether you re out on the trail or stirring the coals in the campfire the ruby beach headband will be super handy in keeping your hair out of your eyes so you can focus on the task at hand it s also just really adorable and a very quick knit so make one for yourself and all your camping buddies pattern includes options to fasten the headband with either a button or longer ends that can be knotted together yarn approximately 137 yd / 125 m fingering weight yarn for tie version slightly less for button version shown in brooklyn tweed loft 100% american targhee- columbia wool 275 yd / 251 m per 50g skein color amaranth 1 skein or caraway 1 skein notions stitch markers tapestry needle button optional sewing needle and coordinating thread for button
